issue.title: [C++] Deprecated APIs in parquet-cpp cause pyarrow build failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2961](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2961). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It looks like `FormatStatValue(..., const char*)` was deprecated in parquet-cpp and is now causing builds like this one (https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/410875517) to fail.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2961?focusedCommentId=16565604) by Phillip Cloud (cpcloud):*
Looks like the change was here: https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp/pull/479/files#diff-124fea0f3cedaa0c9b276305ca91b810R296

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2961?focusedCommentId=16565606) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Already prepared a PR for that.
